=== [[Java Edition protocol/Entity metadata#Player|Player]] ===

Extends [[#Living Entity|Living Entity]].

{| class="wikitable"
 ! Status
 !colspan="2"| Description
 |-
 | 9
 |colspan="2"| Marks item use as finished (finished eating, finished drinking, etc)
This status is not required if you want more control on the server side, this basically finishes the interaction on the client side to decrease the food quantity, arrow quantity, ...

But you can trigger these changes manually through other packets or prevent those changes on the client.

Examples:

*Create an 'Infinity Bow' without the first arrow in your inventory constantly changing in quantity.

*Create a custom food that is infinite, and prevent the stack quantity from decreasing.

*...

Note: This works together with the 'Hand data' so this will have to be updated accordingly to 'finish' the interaction manually.
 |-
 | 22
 |colspan="2"| Enables reduced [[Debug screen|debug screen]] information
 |-
 | 23
 |colspan="2"| Disables reduced [[Debug screen|debug screen]] information
 |-
 | 24
 |colspan="2"| Set [[Server.properties#op-permission-level|op permission level]] to 0
 |-
 | 25
 |colspan="2"| Set [[Server.properties#op-permission-level|op permission level]] to 1
 |-
 | 26
 |colspan="2"| Set [[Server.properties#op-permission-level|op permission level]] to 2
 |-
 | 27
 |colspan="2"| Set [[Server.properties#op-permission-level|op permission level]] to 3
 |-
 | 28
 |colspan="2"| Set [[Server.properties#op-permission-level|op permission level]] to 4
 |-
 | 43
 |colspan="2"| Spawn cloud particles at the player. Sent to a player whose Bad Omen effect is removed to either start a raid or increase its difficulty.
 |}
